abstract: With “American Idol” down to just Kris Allen, Adam Lambert and Danny Gokey, Tuesday’s 8 p.m. installment of high-pressure performances attracted 21.8 million viewers, easily lifting Fox to No. 1 in the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: With “American Idol” down to just Kris Allen, Adam Lambert and Danny Gokey, Tuesday’s 8 p.m. installment of high-pressure performances attracted 21.8 million viewers, easily lifting Fox to No. 1 in the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estim...
lead_paragraph: With “American Idol” down to just Kris Allen, Adam Lambert and Danny Gokey, Tuesday’s 8 p.m. installment of high-pressure performances attracted 21.8 million viewers, easily lifting Fox to No. 1 in the night’s ratings, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Tuesday Ratings: ‘Idol’ Easily Lifts Fox to First Place Again
